about_the_game:
This DLC is only for the players which want to support us to make the game better and bigger.
Tier 2 Supporters which are in the highscores get in the ingame highscores a red entry highlighting.
As an bonus you also get:
+250k base goldstorage
+ 10% more primes from bosses
+ 10% more bossouls from bosses

If you have both supporter packs, you get both extras and extra 100k goldstorage as a thanks for supporting us

Caution:
If you already have the Supporter Pack or you buy it later, the highlighting will be overwritten with the highlighting color of the higher supporter package

name: Defense Clicker - Supporter Pack 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista,7,8,8.1,10
  • Processor: Quadcore or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
